Nivå %1$d: Lær %2$s Alle nivåer er fullført! Gratulerer! For å skrive en . i morsekode, trykk kort. En DOT i morse er oversatt til e Nivå 2: Nivå 3: Dette er introduksjonen for nivå %1$d. Do you remember T? Two DOTs ("..") are transalted to I. Try writing two dots after eachoter
Welcome to your Morse Mate! This app is designed to help you understand and master Morse Code in a fun and engaging way!\n\nMorse code uses short and long signals, called dots and dashes, to represent letters and numbers. So with just . and - can you write any sentences! In Learning Mode, you can learn Morse Code step by step, practicing one letter at a time. You first learn the letter, and then you might also encounter some harder levels where you need to write the letter without seeing the answer in Morse. In Writing Mode, you can freely write in Morse Code, perfect for testing your skills and knowledge. App Created by: Nathaniel Bjerke-Kildal The Alphabet Info about the app
